General.Name: Shenzhen Batian Ecotypic Engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Batian Ecotypic Engineering Co., Ltd. engages in the research, production, sale, and terminal service of compound fertilizers in the People's Republic of China. It offers nitrophosphate fertilizers, nitric acid, phosphate rock, etc. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
